main event: A civilian reported a bright white UFO observed at a distance of about 500 feet in Denver, Colorado on March 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 15 minutes,The sighting was made from the ground with a visual observation,The object had a circular shape and resembled a half dollar at arm's length,The object dropped out of sight instantaneously with a slight curve,Clear weather conditions were reported at the time of the sighting.
